AD_VossSewersBeforeHammer.synopsis: Draws attention to himself and reminds of the mission.
AD_VossSewersBeforeHammer.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically the first time Voss sees you in the Sewers.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn.synopsis: They talk about the coming battle and revolution.
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn.how_to_trigger: Voss and the Dragonborn repeated chatter in the sewers

AD_VossSewersAttackedByPlayer.synopsis: Voss feels betrayed by the player.
AD_VossSewersAttackedByPlayer.how_to_trigger: Plays if the player attacks Voss while he is in the sewers.

AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame.synopsis: Voss tells players he will meet them at the final battle.
AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically after the dialog where you show Voss the hammer. He says this line as they are preparing a spell to leave and leave right after the line.

AD_VossSewersAfterGettingHammer.synopsis: Voss has gathered his allies, the dragonborn is there with him, draws attention again.
AD_VossSewersAfterGettingHammer.how_to_trigger: Plays automatically when Voss sees you in the Sewers after you have obtain the hammer.

AD_VossSewersBeforeHammer_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSewersBeforeHammer_0.text: By the glory of Mother Gith. Tell me you've taken the Orphic Hammer.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_0.speaker: Qudenos
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_0.text: This Lae'zel and her allies. Can they be trusted?

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_2.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_2.text: You ask the wrong question. It is not a matter of 'can'. It is a matter of 'must'.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_1.text: Whether by fortune or necessity, fate made its choice.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_4.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_4.text: Lae'zel was the opportunity we prayed for. This may be our one chance to secure githyanki freedom.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_9.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_9.text: The time is soon upon us, Qudenos. I will not forget your loyalty, friend.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_8.speaker: Qudenos
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_8.text: The lich queen has shackled the red dragons as surely as she has shackled the githyanki.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_6.speaker: Qudenos
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_6.text: You will be the first to battle. And I will be the one to carry you.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_11.speaker: Qudenos
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_11.text: Even with Prince Orpheus to guide us, we are too small in number to defeat Vlaakith alone.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_7.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_7.text: We will not be alone, Qudenos.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_10.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_10.text: For a thousand years, we have been planting the seeds of revolution.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_3.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_3.text: In every crèche, many young whisper Orpheus' name. They do Vlaakith's duty, but out of fear, not faith.

AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_5.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossChatterWithDragonborn_5.text: When the Prince of the Comet blazes his path, they will follow. And so will countless others.

AD_VossSewersAttackedByPlayer_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSewersAttackedByPlayer_0.text: Betrayer. You will not be the end of me. And you will not be the end of Prince Orpheus.

AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame_1.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame_1.text: When you break Prince Orpheus free, his psionic cry will alert us.

AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSewersLeavesForEndgame_0.text: I will fly to your side. Together, we will fell the elder brain and thwart the Grand Design.

AD_VossSewersAfterGettingHammer_0.speaker: Kith'rak Voss
AD_VossSewersAfterGettingHammer_0.text: You've come. We await your good word.
